hint: Apply safe, proven optimizations: push date filters into CTEs, pre-filter dimension tables before joining, and materialize the repeated date subquery to avoid redundant computation.
Isolate shared dimension filters (date, item) into reusable CTEs before joining with fact tables, enabling better predicate pushdown and reducing dimension table scans across all three channels.
Restructure joins aggressively: pre-filter dimensions and pre-join with facts in CTEs, isolate multiple dimension filters early, and decorrelate the date subquery by pre-materializing week sequences.

Transform query structure using advanced patterns: convert date IN conditions to UNION ALL branches, rewrite subqueries as EXISTS clauses, and consider splitting the three channel CTEs into a unified structure with specialized filtering.
